children.value: Until it shall be safe to leave the lamb in the hold of the lion, the laborer in the power of the capitalist, the poor in the hands of the rich, it will not be safe to leave a newly emancipated people completely in the power of their former masters, especially when such masters have not ceased to be such from enlightened moral convictions but by irresistible force.
I was born in Tuckahoe, near Hillsborough, and about twelve miles from Easton, in Talbot County, Maryland.
The blow we strike is not merely to free a country or continent - but the whole world from Slavery - for when slavery falls here it will fall everywhere
I am a Marylander, and love Maryland and her people.
Once you learn to read, you will forever be free.

objects.name: QuoteText3
objects.string:
Until it shall be safe to leave the ____ in the hold of
the lion, the laborer in the power of the capitalist, the
poor in the hands of the rich, it will not be safe to leave
a newly ___________ people completely in the power
of their former masters, especially when such _______ have
not ceased to be such from enlightened moral
convictions but by irresistible force.

objects.string: "Hmm... sorry, that doesn't seem right to me."

objects.name: TutorialText
objects.string:
"Try to fill in the missing word in each of the blank spaces.
Hit submit when you're done.

If you need a break, feel free to press the
big red X in the corner.
You'll be welcome to return any time."

content.text:
"Try to fill in the missing word in each of the blank spaces.
Hit submit when you're done.

If you need a break, feel free to press the
big red X in the corner.
You'll be welcome to return any time."

events.comment: We have to manually set the line height since it'll automatically change on different devices
Link each QuoteText object to all the QuoteInput objects within it
Bring current QuoteText object and all linked QuoteInput objects to the screen

parameters: "\"Looks like that's all of them. Thanks so much!\""
